channel.title: How do I do no-ip?
channel.description: ok, I downloaded HellzEnd sever and when I run it I get on it and dont have to put in the server but when i do or a friend does it says its off line. I download no-ip and created a new host which is what a friends said I needed to do to allow others to connect to me, yet it still doesn't work can some1 help me?

item.title: How do I do no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

I have norton too…this will be a breeze:D Go into norton internet security center under options after you have open it up and if you have password set it will ask for it and then you will come to an options panel(this is for latest norton software, though try yours with this too)
In the options panel it will go personal firewall-trust control-trusted tab-now click add and add an ip…(I am pretty sure this is right) just try it…it could work

Read full topic

item.title: How do I do no-ip?

item.description:

Read full topic

item.title: How do I do no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

I think Either the port forward is wrong or your firewall is blocking people from connecting to your port into the ip…you have to put it inn an exception tab in network connections-right click-properties-advanced-settings-exceptions tab unless you have another firewall set as default:D

Read full topic
